name: OR_LOG_PNDS_INT
description: The OR_LOG_PNDS_INT table contains OR management system log PNDS intervention information.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log that the PNDS interventions refer to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the PNDS interventions in the log.

columns.name: PNDS_INTERVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PNDS intervention.

columns.name: PNDS_INTERVENT_ID_ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.

columns.name: PNDS_INT_USED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this intervention was used.

columns.name: PNDS_INT_NOTES
columns.description: Free text comments about the intervention.

columns.name: PNDS_INT_ADDED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this intervention was added by a user.

columns.name: PNDS_INT_OUT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PNDS outcome associated with this intervention.

columns.name: PNDS_INT_OUT_ID_ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.
